question: Quais s√£o os clientes que mais compraram?
query:
SELECT c.id, c.company, c.last_name, c.first_name, COUNT(od.id) AS total_orders
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
JOIN order_details od ON o.id = od.order_id
WHERE od.status_id IN (2, 3, 4) -- Allocated, Invoiced, Shipped
GROUP BY c.id
ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
